solution_line_template: The perimeter of the field is {field_width}+{field_width}+{field_length}+{field_length}=<<{field_width}+{field_width}+{field_length}+{field_length}={perimeter}>>{perimeter} feet.
Joy will have {total_tape}-{perimeter}=<<{total_tape}-{perimeter}={tape_left_over}>>{tape_left_over} feet of tape left over.
